summary.description: > MEDIUM CONFIDENCE! | > CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'chemical-target', 'similarity-learning', 'chemical', 'target-binding' | Machine learning-based chemical binding similarity using evolutionary relationships of target genes | ensemble evolutionary chemical binding similarity | Scripts to run ensemble evolutionary chemical binding similarity (ensECBS) | RF_Models_Integrated/ - directory for pre-built models. Pfam, Family, Superfamily, Target-ECBS, and ensemble ensECBS models should be downloaded from https://sandbox.zenodo.org/record/297093#.XQgtfIgzaUk
summary.name: ensECBS
